dct_description_sm: 1 map : hand colored; 21 x 27 cm, on sheet 28 x 36 cm

Scale [approximately 1:41,265,200] ; scale of English miles (W 30⁰--E 70⁰/N 40⁰--S 40⁰). ; Relief shown by hachures.; Indicates 'Comparative lengths of Europe & Africa.'; 'European Possessions' are indicated as a key: B. British, D. Dutch, F. French, P. Portuguese, and S. Spanish.; Map is hand-colored in red, yellow and green, mostly along the coastal areas with some demarcations between Lake Chad and Darfur, and through Egypt, Nubia and Abyssinia.; Map includes the Arabian Peninsula, Persia, Beluchistan and Afghanistan, with less detail.; Afghanistan and Baluchistan are labeled Cabool and Beloochistan.
